creator: dh@onclick.org
text:
I stored pages in "/workspace/own docs/LinuxTag" and did not get the pages on
screen. httpd told me that they don't exist. I moved the folder LinuxTag to
somewhere else and it worked. Both places were accessible by httpd over a link
in htdocs. So, I conclude that httpd does not like the whitespace in the
directory name. This is very bad.

Please care about this

What is the EXACT error message that you are getting in the error log?
How EXACTLY are you requesting the pages?
You are aware that spaces must be URL-encoded when entered in your browser?
creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text:
If you can answer the questions previously asked and veryify that this is really
a bug, please reopen the report.
